00151   // two layer module
00152 
00153   template<class Tin, class Thid, class Tout>
00154   layers_2<Tin,Thid,Tout>::layers_2(module_1_1<Tin,Thid> &l1, Thid &h,
00155                                     module_1_1<Thid,Tout> &l2)
00156     : layer1(l1), hidden(h), layer2(l2) {
00157   }
00158 
00159   // Do nothing. Module doesn't have ownership of sub-modules
00160   template<class Tin, class Thid, class Tout>
00161   layers_2<Tin,Thid,Tout>::~layers_2() { }
00162 
00163   template<class Tin, class Thid, class Tout>
00164   void layers_2<Tin,Thid,Tout>::fprop(Tin &in, Tout &out) {
00165     layer1.fprop(in, hidden);
00166     layer2.fprop(hidden, out);
00167   }
00168 
00169   template<class Tin, class Thid, class Tout>
00170   void layers_2<Tin,Thid,Tout>::bprop(Tin &in, Tout &out) {
00171     hidden.clear_dx();
00172     layer2.bprop(hidden, out);
00173     layer1.bprop(in, hidden);
00174   }
00175 
00176   template<class Tin, class Thid, class Tout>
00177   void layers_2<Tin,Thid,Tout>::bbprop(Tin &in, Tout &out) {
00178     hidden.clear_ddx();
00179     layer2.bbprop(hidden, out);
00180     layer1.bbprop(in, hidden);
00181   }
00182 
00183   template<class Tin, class Thid, class Tout>
00184   void layers_2<Tin,Thid,Tout>::forget(forget_param &fp) {
00185     layer1.forget(fp);
00186     layer2.forget(fp);
00187   }
00188 
00189   template<class Tin, class Thid, class Tout>
00190   void layers_2<Tin,Thid,Tout>::normalize() {
00191     layer1.normalize();
00192     layer2.normalize();
00193   }

00197   // N layer module
00198 
00199   template<class T> layers_n<T>::layers_n() {
00200     modules = new std::vector< module_1_1 <T,T>* >();
00201     hiddens = new std::vector< T* >();
00202     this->own_contents = true;
00203   }
00204 
00205   template<class T> layers_n<T>::layers_n(bool oc) {
00206     modules = new std::vector< module_1_1 <T,T>* >();
00207     hiddens = new std::vector< T* >();
00208     this->own_contents = oc;
00209   }
00210 
00211   // Clean vectors. Module doesn't have ownership of sub-modules
00212   template<class T> layers_n<T>::~layers_n() {
00213     if (this->own_contents){
00214       for(unsigned int i=0;i<modules->size(); i++){
00215         delete (*modules)[i];
00216       }
00217       for(unsigned int i=0;i<hiddens->size(); i++){
00218         delete (*hiddens)[i];
00219       }
00220     }
00221     delete modules;
00222     delete hiddens;
00223   }
00224 
00225   template<class T>
00226   void layers_n<T>::addModule(module_1_1 <T, T>* module, T* hidden) {
00227     if (modules->size() > hiddens->size())
00228       ylerror("Inconsistency in layers_n, probably you have passed null \
00229 hidden layer before");
00230 
00231     modules->push_back(module);
00232     if (hidden != NULL)
00233       hiddens->push_back(hidden);
00234 
00235     if (modules->size() - hiddens->size() > 1)
00236       ylerror("Inconsistency in layers_n, probably you did not allocate enough \
00237 hidden states in layers_n");
00238   }
00239 
00240   template<class T>
00241   void layers_n<T>::addLastModule(module_1_1 <T, T>* module) {
00242     addModule(module, NULL);
00243   }
00244 
00245   template<class T>
00246   void layers_n<T>::fprop(T& in, T& out){
00247     if (modules->empty())
00248       ylerror("trying to fprop through empty layers_n");
00249 
00250     T* hi = &in;
00251     T* ho = &in;
00252 
00253     // last will be manual
00254     int niter = modules->size()-1;
00255     for(int i=0; i<niter; i++){
00256       ho = (*hiddens)[i];
00257       (*modules)[i]->fprop(*hi,*ho);
00258       hi = ho;
00259     }
00260     (*modules)[niter]->fprop(*ho,out);
00261   }
00262 
00263   template<class T>
00264   void layers_n<T>::bprop(T& in, T& out){
00265     if (modules->empty())
00266       ylerror("trying to bprop through empty layers_n");
00267 
00268     // clear hidden states
00269     for (unsigned int i=0; i<hiddens->size(); i++){
00270       (*hiddens)[i]->clear_dx();
00271     }
00272     T* hi = &out;
00273     T* ho = &out;
00274 
00275     // last will be manual
00276     int niter = modules->size()-1;
00277     for(int i=niter; i>0; i--){
00278       hi = (*hiddens)[i-1];
00279       (*modules)[i]->bprop(*hi,*ho);
00280       ho = hi;
00281     }
00282     (*modules)[0]->bprop(in,*ho);
00283   }
00284 
00285   template<class T>
00286   void layers_n<T>::bbprop(T& in, T& out){
00287     if (modules->empty())
00288       ylerror("trying to bbprop through empty layers_n");
00289 
00290     // clear hidden states
00291     for (unsigned int i=0; i<hiddens->size(); i++){
00292       (*hiddens)[i]->clear_ddx();
00293     }
00294 
00295     T* hi = &out;
00296     T* ho = &out;
00297 
00298     // last will be manual
00299     int niter = modules->size()-1;
00300     for(int i=niter; i>0; i--){
00301       hi = (*hiddens)[i-1];
00302       (*modules)[i]->bbprop(*hi,*ho);
00303       ho = hi;
00304     }
00305     (*modules)[0]->bbprop(in,*ho);
00306   }
00307 
00308   template<class T>
00309   void layers_n<T>::forget(forget_param_linear& fp){
00310     if (modules->empty())
00311       ylerror("trying to forget through empty layers_n");
00312 
00313     for(unsigned int i=0; i<modules->size(); i++){
00314       module_1_1<state_idx,state_idx> *tt = (*modules)[i];
00315       tt->forget(fp);
00316     }
00317   }
00318 
00319   template<class T>
00320   void layers_n<T>::normalize(){
00321     if (modules->empty())
00322       ylerror("trying to normalize through empty layers_n");
00323 
00324     for(unsigned int i=0; i<modules->size(); i++){
00325       (*modules)[i]->normalize();
00326     }
00327   }

00382   template<class Tin1, class Tin2, class Thid>
00383   void fc_ebm2<Tin1,Tin2,Thid>::bprop(Tin1 &in1, Tin2 &in2, state_idx &energy) {
00384     fout.clear_dx();
00385     // in2.clear_dx(); // TODO this assumes Tin2 == state_idx
00386     fcost.bprop(fout, in2, energy);
00387     fmod.bprop(in1, fout);
00388   }
00389 
00390   template<class Tin1, class Tin2, class Thid>
00391   void fc_ebm2<Tin1,Tin2,Thid>::bbprop(Tin1 &in1, Tin2 &in2, state_idx &energy){
00392     fout.clear_ddx();
00393     // in2.clear_ddx(); // TODO this assumes Tin2 == state_idx
00394     fcost.bbprop(fout, in2, energy);
00395     fmod.bbprop(in1, fout);
00396   }

00398   template<class Tin1, class Tin2, class Thid>
00399   void fc_ebm2<Tin1,Tin2,Thid>::forget(forget_param_linear &fp) {

00401     fcost.forget(fp);
00402   }
00403 
00404   template<class Tin1, class Tin2, class Thid>
00405   double fc_ebm2<Tin1,Tin2,Thid>::infer2(Tin1 &i1, Tin2 &i2, state_idx &energy,
00406                          infer_param &ip) {
00407     fprop(i1, i2, energy); // first propagate all the way up
00408     return fcost.infer2(i1, i2, energy, ip); // then infer from energy
00409   }
00410 
00412   // generic replicable modules classes
00413 
00416   template<class T>
00417   void module_eloop2_fprop(T &m, state_idx &in, state_idx &out) {
00418     if (m.replicable_order() == in.x.order()) {
00419       m.T::fprop(in, out);
00420     } else if (m.replicable_order() > in.x.order()) {
00421       ylerror("the order of the input should be greater or equal to module's\
00422  operating order");
00423     } else {
00424       state_idx_eloop2(iin, in, oout, out) {
00425         module_eloop2_fprop(m, iin, oout);
00426       }
00427     }
00428   }
00429 
00432   template<class T>
00433   void module_eloop2_bprop(T &m, state_idx &in, state_idx &out) {
00434     if (m.replicable_order() == in.x.order()) {
00435       m.T::bprop(in, out);
00436     } else if (m.replicable_order() > in.x.order()) {
00437       ylerror("the order of the input should be greater or equal to module's\
00438  operating order");
00439     } else {
00440       state_idx_eloop2(iin, in, oout, out) {
00441         module_eloop2_bprop(m, iin, oout);
00442       }
00443     }
00444   }
00445 
00448   template<class T>
00449   void module_eloop2_bbprop(T &m, state_idx &in, state_idx &out) {
00450     if (m.replicable_order() == in.x.order()) {
00451       m.T::bbprop(in, out);
00452     } else if (m.replicable_order() > in.x.order()) {
00453       ylerror("the order of the input should be greater or equal to module's\
00454  operating order");
00455     } else {
00456       state_idx_eloop2(iin, in, oout, out) {
00457         module_eloop2_bbprop(m, iin, oout);
00458       }
00459     }
00460   }
00461 
00462   template<class T>
00463   module_1_1_replicable<T>::module_1_1_replicable(T &m) : module(m) {}
00464   template<class T>
00465   module_1_1_replicable<T>::~module_1_1_replicable() {}
00466 
00467   template<class T>
00468   void module_1_1_replicable<T>::fprop(state_idx &in, state_idx &out) {
00469     check_replicable_orders(module, in); // check for orders compatibility
00470     module.resize_output(in, out); // resize output
00471     module_eloop2_fprop<T>(module, in, out);
00472     }
00473 
00474   template<class T>
00475   void module_1_1_replicable<T>::bprop(state_idx &in, state_idx &out) {
00476     check_replicable_orders(module, in); // check for orders compatibility
00477     module_eloop2_bprop<T>(module, in, out);
00478   }
00479 
00480   template<class T>
00481   void module_1_1_replicable<T>::bbprop(state_idx &in, state_idx &out) {
00482     check_replicable_orders(module, in); // check for orders compatibility
00483     module_eloop2_bbprop<T>(module, in, out);
00484   }
